lead_paragraph: French teenager Esteban Ocon steered clear of drawing parallels between his Formula One debut in Sunday's Belgian Grand Prix and that of  boyhood idol Michael Schumacher.

headline.main: Rookie Ocon Steers Clear of Schumacher Parallels
headline.print_headline: Rookie Ocon Steers Clear of Schumacher Parallels

snippet: French teenager Esteban Ocon steered clear of drawing parallels between his Formula One debut in Sunday's Belgian Grand Prix and that of  boyhood idol Michael Schumacher....
